ActJudges Act
SubjectScarth, the Hon. William B. ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY ** Supreme Court of British Columbia
PrecisResignation and granting of an annuity to the Hon. WILLIAM B. SCARTH, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 1, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
